name: Fearless Mixes
description: Enjoy 30 minutes of sizzling hip-hop and trap music!

name: The Sporting Base
description: Stay updated with what is going on in the sports world with our very passionate sports presenters. Marcos and Calvin debate about who deserves the title ‘Champion’, the biggest sports events in the world and get the latest on some of the sports drama.

name: Oh Baby! Bible Stories
description: Hey kids! Go on a very fun adventure with T&C as they invite you to join them for the exciting stories they have just for you.

name: Inspiration For Today
description: Need some motivation? Enjoy some very encouraging and inspiring talks with Ps Gavin and Vicky Enslin. Discover the secret to a successful and peaceful life.

name: Mixes with DJ MoreSA
description: DJ MoreSA gives you only the best house and EDM music for any occasion! Whether you are needing music for a party/ event, are in a good mood or just feel like dancing - his mixes are perfect.

name: The V.A.R Show
description: This show is for every football lover out there. V.A.R is a video assistant referee in football who reviews decisions made by the Head Referee. DJ Sticks & DJ Stones are the new and improved V.A.R - they are here to review how the teams and players are performing. Get the latest and best in football right here.

name: Decoding The Crimeverse
description: Go on a journey with Dani and Noelzii as they uncover and investigate the top serial killers / murderers in the world. They attempt to solve the mystery. Who was the actual killer? What did they look like? Why did they do what they did? What was the psychology behind it?

name: The Political Show
description: We are all about revealing the truth behind the headlines. Don’t you hate being lied to? Well, do not fear, our political presenters will expose all sides of the story and will never lie to you. They focus on reading between the lines, and telling us what other media platforms are not. Get the truth today!

name: The House Master
description: Enjoy 30 minutes of uninterrupted House Music. If you're a House lover, this show is just for you!

name: What's The Topic???
description: Will the next show be comical or a discussion about a serious human violation? We don’t know… Nash covers every and any topic on his show. His shows are definitely eye opening and are worth opening up some time in your schedule to listen to.

name: It's A Mom's Life
description: Struggling to cope as a mom? Not sure if you are raising your children right? Wish you had more time to yourself? Dee and Thando talk about balancing everything as a mom and not just balancing your life but doing it well. Awaken the super mom inside of you!

name: The Table of Perspective
description: People can experience the exact same thing, but because of the manner in which they view life and everything it entails, their perspectives and ultimately their responses can be very different. The presenters try to understand why / what influences the way people perceive and act on life in the way they do.

name: The Shade
description: Radio has never been shadier! Sash, Gloire and Thabo are comedians with a twist. They are on a mission to ensure the quality of the other Active FM shows are up to scratch. They question, review, shade and expose other Active FM presenters in the most entertaining way!

name: The Movie Show
description: Sound effects, acting, storyline, scriptwriting, directing, trailers, cinematography, colour grading and basically anything to do with cinemas and filmmaking - our movie presenters are there. Sash, Ryan and Timothy share hilarious movie facts, incredible behind the scene moments and so much more! Do they rate the movie as worth watching? Find out now!

name: Active FM Live
description: Active FM presenters from different shows join forces to have the most thoughtful and entertaining discussions live.

name: Active FM Interviews
description: Enjoy captivating interviews with great artists, successful businessmen and the influencers of our society.

name: GamerZone
description: A game show with the latest updates and news. Become a pro gamer with Mlindeni today.

name: The Kairos Moment
description: Kairos Moment is an Opportunity or Season of Spiritual inspiration in your life, that will ultimately lead you to making the right decisions and Choices in life.
